title: Almost Black screen on launcher HELP!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hi guys can someone help me ? I just bought my new pc and i wanted to install Lol but when i install launcher when i open it its just almost black i can see trough it but its not installing and doint nothing i cant press nothing but i can see it its not all black .... Picture : http://imgur.com/a/JntZ7
Help !

replies.body: Have you updated your Windows and drivers since getting your new rig?  This might be happening due to some compatibility issue.  Try going to your patcher properties and run it in Windows 7 compatibility.  Let me know if that helps!
It didnt helped meh ... I will try to update drivers . Ty for help

Thanks for the follow up!  You may have a bad install or update that's no longer able to launch the game, and the lack of a Launch button further affirms that suspicion.  If you haven't downloaded the updated client, you should be able to use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a clean re-install of the game.  Otherwise, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) should fix it up.  I hope that helps!
